message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $180. I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. That's a bit high for me.  Would you consider $100?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I can do $140, but that's as low as I can go. It's a great product, and I think you'll really appreciate it!
Thanks for coming down Alice.  I'm willing to meet you halfway - how about $120?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob, but I still need to make a profit. I can do $130, and that's my final offer on this price
